Question: SK CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SK hynix

Product: HBM3E Memory Solutions

- HBM3E offers industry-leading data processing speed of 1.18TB/s
- Provides 1.4 times more data capacity compared to its predecessor
- 10% improvement in heat dissipation with Advanced MR-MUF technology
- Also presented Compute Express Link (CXL) interface, Computational Memory Solution (CMS) product, and Accelerator-in-Memory based Accelerator (AiMX) for AI applications
